 2008-10062008-06-05152008,  ,  ,  HRDC, 
ActAn Act to amend the Canada Labour Code, the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act, the Canada Student Loans Act and the Public Service Employment Act
SubjectCanada Student Loans - Reservist Legislation
PrecisOrder fixing June 13, 2008 as the day on which sections 2 to 5 of AN ACT TO AMEND the CANADA LABOUR CODE, the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ACT, the CANADA STUDENT LOANS ACT and the PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT Act (so-called Reservist Legislation) come into force.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0064 Publication Date: 2008-06-25
AttachmentsAttachment
act: An Act to amend the Canada Labour Code, the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act, the Canada Student Loans Act and the Public Service Employment Act
subject: Canada Student Loans - Reservist Legislation
precis: Order fixing June 13, 2008 as the day on which sections 2 to 5 of AN ACT TO AMEND the CANADA LABOUR CODE, the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ACT, the CANADA STUDENT LOANS ACT and the PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT Act (so-called Reservist Legislation) come into force.
